title: Archie Wilson & The Beasts of Loch Ness
description: Tragedy strikes forcing 10 year-old Archie Wilson to live with a father he doesnâ€™t know in Foyers, Scotland. Archie stumbles upon a secret underground cavern, befriends Gordon the Loch Ness Monster and the last remaining Sporrans who, for over a thousand years have lived in secret. When the most treacherous creature of all time; known as the Nuckelavee tries to resurrect itself. Archie is the only line of defense against the Nuckelavee, and the fate of the world may rest in his hands.
author: Mark A. Cooper
